name: CodeSensei
description: An AI-powered coding mentor built with Next.js that explains code, suggests improvements, and provides tailored learning resources. Perfect for helping students and developers grasp complex logic effortlessly.

name: SILVER-SEAT
description: A modern movie ticket booking platform where users can browse movies, check showtimes, and book tickets seamlessly. Built with MERN stack for a smooth and responsive experience.

name: BUYZIT
description: An intuitive grocery shopping platform that enables users to browse products, add items to their cart, and complete purchases with ease. Designed for a seamless online shopping experience.

name: SAVE-CODE
description: A simple yet powerful Pastebin-like application where users can save, share, and retrieve code snippets using unique IDs. No authentication requiredâ€”just store and access your code effortlessly.

name: Foodie-find
description: A restaurant discovery platform that allows users to explore dining options based on location, cuisine, and other filters. Integrated with real Zomato data for accurate recommendations.
